content.heading: 1. Information We Collect
content.text: We collect personal information you provide when you register, such as your name, email, and phone number.

content.heading: 2. How We Use Information
content.text: Your information is used to provide and improve our services, personalize your experience, and communicate with you.

content.heading: 3. Data Security
content.text: We implement reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access.

content.heading: 4. Third-Party Services
content.text: We may use third-party providers for analytics, authentication, or other services.

content.heading: 5. Updates to Policy
content.text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Please review periodically for changes.
